alert.note: Alert for Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ROBERTSON COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Fairview, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Licks Battlefield, Burika, Alhambra, Kentontown, Piqua, Mitchells Mill and Blue Licks Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
